name: Jello Flip
description: Lets dive into the adventure of this little young jello who is striving for his best score ! Can you beat the best scores around your friends ? or maybe you can enjoy killing your time playing Jello Flip while your downloads are on play ? Jello Flip is the very basic casual game for your desktop ! its offline and has beautiful sounds and peaceful game play ! You can resize it to a very small screen so you can work and play at the same time ! Jello Flip has more than 70 levels and more will be coming soon in the future, the basic physics of this game is lovely and smooth and all you need to do is to click to flip ! Its that simple and easy ! Maybe your kid will love this if they are not allowed a tablet or phone !  I hope you will enjoy this tiny little work of mine ! If you liked it or loved it then please a small donation would mean a lot to me ! Enjoy !
